DOC.brief_summary: Children diagnose FAS DPN clinic ( receive non-study service clinic/referrals ) receive baseline assessment . The baseline assessment child include : medical issue ( include medication ) , intellectual assessment , academic achievement , language , social functioning , executive functioning , neurological assessment , perceive self-confidence , behavioral observation parent-child interaction ( videotaped cod ) . For caregiver , baseline assessment include : demographic , medical history , educational history , current service , satisfaction service , knowledge FAS , stress , parent competence , family functioning .
DOC.detailed_description: Functional analysis challenge behavior conduct . Intervention individualize , multimodal , behavioral consultation . The consultation include : FAS education , emotional/practical support , teach child management strategy specific child FAS/ARND , advocacy assistance , school consultation . Specific procedure base previous finding experience . In particular , specialized “ Behavior Support Plans ” develop child input parent , teacher , clinician . Team consultation child ’ home weekly visit . Instruction include information FAS , behavioral strategy , information advocate service system . Evaluation Plan : Both intervention : Treatment control group compare use pre- post-tests measure . Post-tests conclusion intervention 9-month follow-up ( end school year ) .
